channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Broken paving and patching of paved area with tarmac rather than correct paving stones, 16th October
item.description:
Pedestrian area of Promenade has this example and many more examples of broken paving and incorrect non matching materials used.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 31, Promenade, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham

item.title: Street light is permanently out problem, 16th October
item.description:
The streetlight O/S number 21 is not working at all and its very dark at night.

item.title: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles problem, 16th October
item.description:
Customer has reported the traffic light as not detecting the vehicles no more but if it does it take a while before letting vehicles out

item.title: Obstruction caused by wall/building problem, 16th October
item.description:
PERM REPAIR: Could you raise a perm repair enquiry for the relevant AHR for further investigation please. Made safe with cones
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loads of rubbish strewn all over, 16th October
item.description:
I can only upload 3 pictures, but I could have taken 50 of all the rubbish in this section of the path. It all seems to be coming from the two houses nearest.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16, Fulbrook Close, Springbank, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 16th October
item.description:
Pothole In the road Wider than 30cm & deeper than 4cm
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Problem with drainage problem, 16th October
item.description:
There are several grips down Hartley Lane, these are full and are not working as they need shoveling out and throwing down the bank. Having looked at this I am unable to find these grips on GCC system. Customer knows about these as he has farmed the land for 50 years. If these were cleared then they would function properly they would stop the run off onto nearby properties.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose/rattling cover/ironwork problem, 16th October
item.description:
there are 3 drains that are blocked, it was raining the other day and the road was flooded and entering a nearby property. Customer states that they may need scraping off.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 16th October
item.description:
10m right of the lamp post 00071 the there is a big tree the tree has been making quite a loud noise and is worried that it is creaking as well and is just asking if it can be looked
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown hedges, 16th October
item.description:
The overgrown hedges/verge is pushing pedestrians dangerously close to the road. The road has fast moving HGVs and walking in the area is off putting for vulnerable road users. Please help make this safer. Thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stoke Orchard Road, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles problem, 16th October
item.description:
